title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still face the issue.

title: Payment Failure During Checkout
description: Customer reports that their payment keeps failing when trying to purchase items using a credit card.

title: Unable to Reset Password
description: Password reset emails are not being sent to the customer’s registered email address.

title: App Crashing on Startup
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately after opening on Android devices.

title: Order Not Delivered
description: Customer placed an order two weeks ago but has not received the package yet.

title: Incorrect Billing Amount
description: Customer was charged twice for the same subscription renewal.

title: Website Not Loading
description: Customer reports that the website is not loading on desktop browsers, but mobile works fine.

title: Account Locked After Multiple Attempts
description: Customer's account was locked due to multiple failed login attempts, and they need help unlocking it.

title: Subscription Not Activated
description: Customer purchased a premium subscription, but the account still shows as free plan.

title: Email Notifications Not Working
description: Customer is not receiving any email notifications for updates or promotions.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but hasn’t received it yet.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
description: Customer suggests adding a dark mode option to improve user experience during nighttime use.

title: App Not Updating Automatically
description: Customer reports that the app is not updating to the latest version even after enabling auto-update.

title: Delayed Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer didn’t receive an order confirmation email after completing the purchase.

title: Broken Link on Homepage
description: Customer found that the ‘Contact Us’ link on the homepage leads to a 404 page.

title: App Freezes During Payment
description: Customer reports that the mobile app freezes on the payment screen after entering details.

title: Order Delivered to Wrong Address
description: Customer received notification of delivery but the package was sent to another address.

title: Push Notifications Not Appearing
description: Customer reports that push notifications are not appearing on iOS devices.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer cannot upload a new profile picture; system throws an unknown error.

title: Product Out of Stock After Payment
description: Customer completed payment but later found the product marked as out of stock.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Customer reports that the website takes too long to load product pages.

title: Coupon Code Not Working
description: Customer’s discount coupon code is not being applied during checkout.

title: App Logout Automatically
description: Customer reports being logged out automatically every few hours even with 'Stay Logged In' checked.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Customer reports a timeout error when using PayPal for transactions.

title: Product Image Not Loading
description: Images of some products fail to load on the product details page.

title: Invoice Not Generated
description: Customer reports that the invoice for their last purchase is missing from the account.

title: Feedback Form Not Submitting
description: Customer cannot submit feedback form after filling all fields correctly.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Failed
description: Customer reports that 2FA codes are not being accepted during login.

title: Delayed Push Notifications
description: Push notifications are arriving several hours late for Android users.

title: Wishlist Not Saving Items
description: Customer reports that products added to wishlist disappear after refreshing the page.

title: Voice Search Not Working
description: Customer reports that voice search is not detecting voice input on the mobile app.

title: Corrupted Download File
description: Customer reports that downloaded files are corrupted and fail to open.
